featured.text: The new vaccine was banned by the Food and Drug Administration due to its fatal side effects.
The drug dealer was ________ by the police while he was selling cocaine to a high school student.
Recent research has found lots of evidence to the drug company’s claims about its “miracle” tablets for curing cancer.
The problem is made worse by doctors who give their patients large doses of useless drugs.

other.text: Many scholars and experts from all over the world will be invited to attend this yearly ______ on drug control.
The problem of illegal drug use is very complex and cannot be traced to merely one _____ reason.

definition.zh_def: 藥物；用於治療、預防或診斷疾病的化學物質。
definition.en_def: A substance used for medical treatment, especially a medicine or a narcotic.
definition.example: The doctor prescribed a new drug to help manage her symptoms.
